trans-unit.source: To call this custom API from an iOS client, use the MSClient invokeAPI method.
trans-unit.target: To call this custom API from an iOS client, use the MSClient invokeAPI method.

trans-unit.source: There are two versions of this method, one for JSON-formatted requests, and one for any data type:
